page.title: 04LITTLE BARFORD SCHOOL.
page.content: In{Little Barford} there is an old disused school.The school has only one large room and it has a little porch with a wooden door.The windows which are high up in the walls are all smashed but we did see a light bulb but mostly there are old crates and bits of furniture.The school is on the left handside when you are going to{ {Tempsford}from{St.Neots}on the Little Barford road.It has an out building which were the toilets and washrooms.The playground is no longer there.It has'nt been used since the war and it is owned by the{Alington {Family.}
